channel.title: Need Help guys!
channel.description:
ok, i'm using Stan's Isle V.1 and i need help with a few things...
First of all before i release i want the ::pickup command not to work on my server second, i would like to add the rest of kamajar to the map. Lastly... I want to make a new crown in game, with player rights to 1.5 for the green crown ( forum )
Thanks in advance gODS. ;D[br][size=1]Posted on: June 12, 2007, 09:36:14 AM[/size][hr]bump[br][size=1]Posted on: June 12, 2007, 09:54:58 AM[/size][hr]bump

item.title: Need Help guys!
item.dc:creator: @xone xone
item.description:
@xone wrote:

gods man
Satan’s Isle

Ok. To disable the pickup command, for mods and admins AND owners, etc. here’s the code.

else if (command.startsWith("pickup") && (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("admin") || playerRights > 3)) { try { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7,11)); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(12)); if (/*newItemID <= 10000 && */newItemID >= 0) { addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { sendMessage("No such item."); } } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Wrong Syntax! Use as ::pickup 0995 10"); }

I can’t help you with the island.

And for the last thing, I’d like to do the same, with new crowns. So tell me when you get that

Read full topic
